column1: Management with Data Analytics (100% online) MSc
column5: Learn how to harness data in leadership with our MSc Management with Data Analytics. Studied entirely online and taught by research-active experts.A CAREER-FOCUSED MSC MANAGEMENT WITH DATA ANALYTICS, DESIGNED FOR ASPIRING DATA-LED LEADERSThis 100% online MSc Management with Data Analytics is for leaders and aspiring leaders aiming to progress into more senior roles. As you study, you’ll be developed into a well-rounded, thoughtful, active, reflective and practical professional with a genuine appreciation of the strategic and operational challenges in running an organisation, particularly through the lens of harnessing data for success.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
